text: Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. Happy November 17th! – wheew!!! Above is a sneak peek from my daughter Mandy’s wedding. For the last few weeks I have been in wedding prep mode which was keeping me busy. That, plus all the house repairs going on left me no time for anything else. The wedding was last weekend. The weather was beautiful as was everything. All went smoothly. It was a fun wedding with lots of dancing. I have been editing photos and will share a post all about it this week. Once we got home, I crashed and decided to take it slow all week, hence no new post, all I had the energy for was to update an older holiday post: Christmas Tree Stand Collar Made Using Dollar Store Frames (open in same tab) Yesterday I got my energy back and started to take apart my studioffice to ready it for some changes as well as pull out a few Christmas bins to come up with a plan to decorate my house for the holidays. More on both of these coming up so stay tuned. Now onto the links I found this week. Something to Think About Be Your Best Self With These 5 Proven Neurohacks (open in same tab) How to fall properly to avoid injury. (open in same tab) “The secret joys of living are not found by rushing from point A to point B, but by slowing down and inventing some imaginary letters along the way.” – Douglas Pagels Did you know that Christmas is only 6 weeks away? If you need ideas or festive inspiration to make it a very merry one at your house, here are many doable ideas for you. (open in same tab) If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here. And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more. html:
Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online.

Happy November 17th! – wheew!!! Above is a sneak peek from my daughter Mandy’s wedding. For the last few weeks I have been in wedding prep mode which was keeping me busy. That, plus all the house repairs going on left me no time for anything else.

The wedding was last weekend. The weather was beautiful as was everything. All went smoothly. It was a fun wedding with lots of dancing.

I have been editing photos and will share a post all about it this week.

Once we got home, I crashed and decided to take it slow all week, hence no new post, all I had the energy for was to update an older holiday post:

  • Christmas Tree Stand Collar Made Using Dollar Store Frames (open in same tab)

Yesterday I got my energy back and started to take apart my studioffice to ready it for some changes as well as pull out a few Christmas bins to come up with a plan to decorate my house for the holidays.

More on both of these coming up so stay tuned.

Now onto the links I found this week.

Something to Think About


Be Your Best Self With These 5 Proven Neurohacks (open in same tab)

How to fall properly to avoid injury. (open in same tab)

“The secret joys of living are not found by rushing from point A to point B, but by slowing down and inventing some imaginary letters along the way.” – Douglas Pagels

Did you know that Christmas is only 6 weeks away? If you need ideas or festive inspiration to make it a very merry one at your house, here are many doable ideas for you. (open in same tab)

If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here.

And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more.
